<title level="1" right="Trait">[Flowing](/Traits.aspx?ID=277)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 251</row>

Planes with this trait have a flow of time that is consistently faster or slower than that of other planes.
name: Flowing
